title: Fleuron
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829131655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829131655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Fleuron**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829131655im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Typophile_Fleuron_3848.gif)

A typographic ornament usually in the shape of a flower or a leaf.

See also [Hedera](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829131655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hedera).
author: paul d hunt
